quote: Why anybody gets my sense of humor I never know, but I do know that when they do, I keep them as close as I possibly can.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: I never write anything without humor, just because I like humor, but at the same time, it is a way for anything fantastical to become relatable.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: People often think that you have a sense of humor because you think that life is funny. Life isn't funny at all. It's appalling and tragic.
author: Howard Jacobson

quote: Edward Norton and I have known each other awhile. I just think he's the real deal, supremely talented and smart. He's got a great sense of humor.
author: Kevin Spacey

quote: George Carlin is brilliant with words, and Johnny Winters is very creative. It's taking something common and drawing out the humor, being clever with words.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Now, Richard Pryor was unique. Many misunderstood his humor. He lit up the hallway, but they didn't understand his use of profanity. He didn't use it just to be using it; he used it in the context of his satire.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: There is hope for the future because God has a sense of humor and we are funny to God.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Sometimes I find I'm wearing a divided, split brain in terms of drama and humor.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: My sense of humor is a turkey, and I pull it out of the oven and baste it in reality.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: I want to show the world my humor.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: If I had to describe my sense of humor, I would say it's contemporary wit, you know what I'm saying?
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: I met Elton John at an Interview dinner, and we just sort of became friends. He's got such a wicked sense of humor.
author: Moby

quote: Political correctness? In my humor, I never talk about politics. I was never much into all that.
author: Don Rickles

quote: Half the battle is that people have to like you before you say one joke, one bit of humor.
author: Don Rickles

quote: Down the road, I'll probably have a kid or two or three. And there will probably be political events or spiritual things to comment on, and humor.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: A sense of humor keen enough to show a man his own absurdities will keep him from the commission of all sins, or nearly all, save those worth committing.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: I love Stephen Colbert and Jon Stewart because they're bringing irony back into American humor, which is a delicious treat. The entire Colbert persona of being extreme right-wing when he's not at all is highly amusing. He does it so well, but sometimes a little too well. My wife is convinced he's completely that way.
author: John Lydon

quote: Bob Dole used to be really funny. Barney Frank can be kind of funny. Bob Kerrey has a good sense of humor.
author: Al Franken

quote: There is - I mean - I found early in life that righteous indignation is a little off-putting, and so I try to couch it with humor.
author: Al Franken

quote: There's plenty of room for humor in politics, God knows, but it's a serious business.
author: Al Franken

quote: You're not going to see my sense of humor on the football field. That's not a place for me to joke around.
author: Tom Brady

quote: I'm a huge Muppets fan. Gigantic. I think they're genius. I think they're some of the best work out there and completely underrated, just because of how genius they are. I love that kind of humor. It's so innocent but brilliant.
author: Andie MacDowell

quote: I'll speak for myself, but there's a lot of humor to be found in sarcasm and darkness. You talk to any paramedic, they survive by developing a pretty off-kilter sense of humor.
author: Nicolas Cage

quote: Wit - the salt with which the American humorist spoils his intellectual cookery by leaving it out.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Sites like Funny or Die and College Humor are great, but I'd say it's appealing to 80% men and 20% women.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: Humor is a part of spirituality.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: I'm very confident that Nick Hornby always gets it right as a writer. He has the vernacular and passion. He is adroit and dry, and balances humor with the humanity of life.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I defuse everything I can with it. Humor is such a great shield.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: Humor has justly been regarded as the finest perfection of poetic genius.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: True humor springs not more from the head than from the heart. It is not contempt; its essence is love. It issues not in laughter, but in still smiles, which lie far deeper.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: One seldom expects the country's president to adequately note the passing of a rocker, but Jimmy Carter's assessment of Elvis Presley's appeal - 'energy, rebelliousness and good humor' - is remarkably close to the mark.
author: Molly Ivins

quote: OK, in all seriousness, I would say I couldn't be in a relationship without equality, generosity, integrity, spirit, kindness and humor. And awesomeness.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: You know, Freud accepted his lot very stoically and very well and with a sense of humor. He aged and died gracefully, and there's a lot to be said for that.
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: My dad was very much a John Wayne kind of guy, but he was also a great guy, great sense of humor, a real dedicated dad. I don't think he ever missed a hockey game I was in.
author: Denis Leary

quote: I'm really happy I went to a Catholic school because a lot of the repressive tactics they use make for great senses of humor.
author: Denis Leary

quote: Bob Hope, like Mark Twain, had a sense of humor that was uniquely American, and like Twain, we'll likely not see another like him.
author: Dick Van Dyke

quote: I don't think that because you die and move on to somewhere else that you lose your sense of humor.
author: Peter Jackson

quote: I don't think arrested-adolescent humor will fade. Maybe the form will change, but I guarantee its replacement will still be based in immature behavior from mature figures.
author: Adam McKay

quote: Different taste in jokes is a great strain on the affections.
author: George Eliot

quote: A lot of people can find something to laugh at in my humor, I guess.
author: Ron White

quote: The wealthy don't have any sense of humor. It's not like the English, where the theater is perhaps the one place where they have a sense of humor about themselves.
author: Alec Baldwin

quote: I love puns. I've been known to turn the car around just to take advantage of a good pun situation. It really is the highest form of humor.
author: Karin Slaughter

quote: I think a sense of humor will help get a girl out of a dark place.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: The overwhelming majority of Americans are possessed of two great qualities a sense of humor and a sense of proportion.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: For me, I really love 'Tim and Eric' and 'Dr. Steve Brule' and a lot of the Adult Swim shows, so I like strange, weird, sometimes slightly upsetting humor.
author: Gillian Jacobs

quote: I like a man who can be a real friend, has a good sense of humor, a good pair of shoes and a healthy gold card.
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: My sense of humor lies a little closer to the middle.
author: Jason Bateman

quote: My family is pretty funny. My mother is British, so she's got a very dry sense of humor. That's where I got that from.
author: Jason Bateman

quote: I'm a comedian, and I definitely see the humor in a lot of things. I am also sad a lot. I cry often and easily. I think you're supposed to feel all kinds of things.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

author: Junot Diaz

quote: Since the very beginning, Emeril's had a sense of humor about me calling him names and poking fun at him.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: Sometimes I used to think to myself, 'Have I lost a sense of humor?' but I don't think that I have. I think one can be as snarky and sarcastic as lots of people, but I have never found that it makes me particularly happy.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: I have a very dark sense of humor. I swear. I have a very playful relationship with Jesus.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Wit is the lowest form of humor.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Going to AA helped me to see that there were other people who had problems that had found a way to talk about them and find relief and humor through that.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: I don't understand how somebody wouldn't have a sense of humor about themselves.
author: John Malkovich

quote: Tony and I had a good on and off screen relationship, we are two very different people, but we did share a sense of humor, we now live in different parts of the world but when we find ourselves in the same place it is more or less as if there had been no years in between.
author: Roger Moore

quote: The comic is the perception of the opposite humor is the feeling of it.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: There are certain things I learned when I first started learning about acting, to try and place the character physically and emotionally. And the way you place them emotionally is often with humor.
author: David Duchovny

quote: I've met a lot of people who've lost their jobs and they still have a sense of humor.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: I'm sure I've all but lost friends by maintaining that, despite their love for it, I always saw Stanley Kramer's 'It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World' as more of an exercise in anti-comedy than humor.
author: Dick Cavett

quote: 'Guardians of the Galaxy' is tongue-in-cheek and has a sense of humor about itself. But it's nothing like 'Deadpool.' 'Deadpool' is this super-bizarre thing. The best thing about it is that it's R-rated.
author: T. J. Miller

quote: I think that what comes through in Chicago humor is the affection. Even though you're poking fun at someone or something, there's still an affection for it.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: Humor's a weapon if you want to make it one.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: I don't know how many sacred cows there are today. I think there's a little confusion between humor and gross passing for humor. That's kind of regrettable.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: I think there's a little confusion between humor and 'gross' passing for humor. That's kind of regrettable, because they aren't the same thing.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: The schizophrenic has no sense of humor. His world is a constantly daunting, unfriendly place.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: Humor is so important to the American scene throughout history.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: What you see on stage is pretty much the way I am... a dry sense of humor.
author: Bob Newhart
tags: I Am, Sense Of Humor, You

quote: I think there's something about the Irish experience - that we had to have a sense of humor or die.
author: Frank McCourt

quote: That's what kept us going - a sense of absurdity, rather than humor.
author: Frank McCourt

quote: For some reason, I had a responsibility to my family and the people who lived around me. I felt that I had to convey their dignity - the way they dealt with adversity and poverty - and their good humor.
author: Frank McCourt

quote: Humor is the first of the gifts to perish in a foreign tongue.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I've got a great sense of humor, and if I'm able to say or do something in a movie that people feel like they want to repeat, that's hugely flattering.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: I have the humor of a 9-year-old boy, and sometimes I've had laughing fits on-air.
author: Megyn Kelly

quote: My wife, my daughters, even my grandchildren are funny. You've got to keep a sense of humor because anger destroys you.
author: Michael Caine

quote: I suppose I miss the British cynicism and the humor.
author: Rod Stewart

quote: Jeffrey Zeldman had an astonishing ability to craft a seductive coolness using educated references, dry humor, and retro/organic imagery.
author: Matt Mullenweg

quote: I'm able to see humor in a lot of things.
author: Juliana Hatfield

quote: If you don't have humor, you're not going to make it. You're going to be one of those people who walks around with your head about to explode.
author: James McBride

quote: I can't not put humor in a book.
author: Albert Brooks

quote: My humor is traced with dark - I've got dark patches all over the place.
author: Albert Brooks

quote: Sometimes the only way to deal with horrific things in life is through a dark sense of humor.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: It's good to be able to laugh at yourself and the problems you face in life. Sense of humor can save you.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: I think it's critical, a sense of humor. It did help me - it does help me, continuously.
author: Teri Garr

quote: When I teach the formal curriculum, I have the chance to think about it ahead of time. I can rehearse it. I can illustrate it with self-deprecating humor and humble-sounding personal disclosure. I can try to make it comes out just right.
author: John Ortberg

quote: I think humor is such a personal thing, and you put a microphone in somebody's face, they're going to say something that offends somebody.
author: Jane Lynch

quote: Anyone who knows me, and most of my fans, know that I have a sense of humor.
author: Glenn Danzig

quote: It's weird doing red carpets it's uncomfortable. But you can have a sense of humor about it.
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Anyone who's married to Mariah Carey - I'm pretty sure - doesn't have a great sense of humor. I mean, let's be honest: she's ridiculous. What is her game plan?
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: Paul Rudd has a very specific brand of humor.
author: Michael Pena

quote: 'War on Everyone,' I think... the script was hilarious to me, but it's very dark, dark humor. It's super dark.
author: Michael Pena

quote: When you finish a drama, you go, 'I can't wait to do a comedy.' When you finish a comedy, you go, 'I want to do a dramedy, dark humor.'
author: Michael Pena

quote: People think I'm a very serious actor, which I am. But you know, if you don't have a sense of humor doing what I do, you perish.
author: Martin Landau

quote: Nobody enjoys the 'little show about nothing' humor more than me, but that is never the way I look at it.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I have a need to always make people laugh. I have a desperate need. I love a great sense of humor. The people I sort of surround myself with have that.
author: Peter Dinklage

quote: Women respond to comfort and a sense of humor. I was always able to make them laugh, so that helps a lot.
author: Peter Dinklage

quote: My father could be very witty, even if the humor was always on the darker side of irony.
author: Maurice Sendak

quote: I make jokes because humor is the greatest healing factor that there is.
author: Dick Dale

quote: In Buddhism, they say attachment to anything only leads to suffering. So when we laugh, it's our way of saying, 'I'm unattached to that.' You're tickled by it, it makes your lobes do something on their own. So humor is very important to me. I always take that to the stage first.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: People who have any kind of illness use humor as a type of coping.
author: Edward Zwick

quote: I'm a huge fan of Steve Martin. He's hilarious, but he has this depth to him and this way of dealing with the difficult things in life with a sense of humor that I think has helped me as an actress.
author: Alexandra Daddario

quote: I'm not a particularly dark individual. I have my moments, it's true, but I do have a sense of humor.
author: Alan Moore

quote: I was a timid little guy when I was a kid. I used humor as a defense; I became the class clown. But deep inside, I felt real vulnerable.
author: Mike Huckabee

quote: And, you know, I liked writing humor. Well, I should say, I wanted to write seriously, but it kept turning funny.
author: Roseanne Barr

quote: The real important things are kindness and a sense of humor. I've been fortunate to have dated and could have easily married women who have those qualities, and time and circumstances didn't work out. Timing plays a big part.
author: Hill Harper

quote: I don't think of myself as funny - I don't fill up a room with my humor... I would fail miserably as a stand-up comedian.
author: Steve Carell

quote: Sometimes when I try to make jokes or have a sense of humor in interviews, it doesn't go over very well. But Twitter made my life easier in this way that I didn't expect. author: Anna Kendrick

quote: I've got a great sense of humor.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Twitter is the place where I try to be more funny. And then I use Instagram just as my diary. I pull some jokes on there, but I think people have a better sense of humor on Twitter.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: I guess, for me, I've always thought that there was humor everywhere. And as a kid, I just, you know, I grew up an only child, and I - sort of nothing made me happier than to make my parents laugh. I remember I had costumes and things laying around the house that I was, you know, anything that I could do to make my parents laugh.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: Humor is very interesting to me. My films are not comedies, but there's comedy in them from time to time, absurdities, just like in real life.
author: David Lynch

quote: It's always the girl comedy and the guy comedy. It bums me out. You'd think there'd be a progression, from James L. Brooks and Nora Ephron into more subtle humor and behavior and psychology. author: Parker Posey

quote: Our records, if you have a dark sense of humor, were funny, but our records weren't about comedy. They were about protests, fantasy, confrontation and all that.
author: Ice Cube

quote: In high drama or high tragedy or anything, it's not really human unless there's some humor at the same time. And vice versa. So I guess I tend to gravitate towards projects which tread a dodgy tightrope between two things, which aren't really one or another.
author: Rebecca Hall

quote: You don't necessarily equate me with humor!
author: Sean Bean

quote: I came from a dysfunctional family - very dysfunctional. And my father used to find great humor in throwing me down the stairs.
author: Bob Beckel

quote: My sense of humor often gets me in trouble.
author: Duncan Jones

quote: I have a sense of humor, and sometimes it gets me into trouble.
author: Duncan Jones

quote: I like telling stories with a sense of humor. But humor can also distance you from the subject you're writing about. I'm interested in using humor as a portal to something a bit more serious.
author: Jens Lekman

quote: Any band that doesn't have a sense of humor has a little bit of a problem.
author: Jens Lekman

quote: It doesn't take many people to have a bad sense of humor to get in trouble at a corporation.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Humor without sadness underneath it feels cheap and aggressive.
author: John Cameron Mitchell

quote: A laugh is a surprise. And all humor is physical. I was always athletic, so that came naturally to me.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: Let's not call physical comedy falling down and pratfalls. All humor is physical, no matter how you dish it out. It's timing, like a dancer or an athlete would have.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: I come from a much freer kind of performance thing, where I rely on my own improv and my own sense of humor.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: I'm just very amused by five-year-old humor.
author: Kesha

quote: 'Take Shelter' is a tough movie because there's no humor in it, so there's really no way to judge how you're doing - whether people are still with you or not.
author: Jeff Nichols

quote: Impropriety is the soul of wit.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: You are not angry with people when you laugh at them. Humor teaches tolerance.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: One of the great things about the Internet is that you can read what everybody has to say about everything. It is fascinating to me, the critiques about humor by people who have no sense of humor.
author: Matt Groening

quote: It's funny. People often compare me to other humor essayists. They're usually quite nice comparisons; I will accept those gladly. But I am always sort of appalled at the idea of being lumped with other, more chick-y female writers. And the truth is probably that neither comparison is accurate.
author: Sloane Crosley

quote: I think a lot of humor is about distracting yourself. Pretend you're not trying to make it funny. Because for some reason the effort to be funny smells like sulphur in our culture.
author: Sloane Crosley

quote: It's easier to sit there and say you don't like feminists because they don't have a sense of humor.
author: Joan Jett

quote: And I loved Fats Waller. I love his instrumental abilities, his vocal abilities and his sense of humor.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: I think the humor, when applied in the right amount, only serves to intensify the other emotions in a given song; it highlights them, makes them stand out.
author: John Grant

quote: It's an amusing idea to some, this feminism thing - this audacious notion that women should be able to move through the world as freely, and enjoy the same inalienable rights and bodily autonomy, as men. At least, that's the impression given when feminism and feminists are all too often the targets of lazy humor.
author: Roxane Gay

quote: My humor had changed from foolishness to making sense.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: I go out and speak to women's groups all the time, and I say, 'Guys, you gotta laugh and find the humor in things. You gotta pass it on.'
author: Vicki Lawrence

quote: A sense of humor is great - it goes a long, long way in a marriage.
author: Chris Rock

quote: A woman who knows that she doesn't have to get all decked out to look good is sexy. A woman who can make you feel smart with her conversation skills is also sexy. I believe the sense of humor is important.
author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quote: One thing I have that the majority of other designers don't is humor. That's distinctly my approach, and it was distinctly Franco Moschino's, too.
author: Jeremy Scott

quote: People, I guess, generally come to see me do stand-up with a working knowledge of my broad sense of humor on 'The Daily Show'... I don't think anyone would mistake me as an actual anchor.
author: John Oliver

quote: Writing is not for me. I completely lose my sense of humor when I write. I become extremely pathetic, very sensational. Images give me possibilities that I don't have with words.
author: Marjane Satrapi

quote: I feel like I've always had a sordid sense of humor, and it's only gotten more twisted as I've gotten older.
author: Tituss Burgess

quote: You can't do anything to be funny. That's cringeworthy. If your humor comes out of a place of love every time, you don't make the joke bigger than you. The funniest comedians are in touch with their emotional level.
author: John Krasinski

quote: It's great to be able to connect parents with children both emotionally and through humor. I look forward to exploring family entertainment once again and examining the specifics of our day-to-day lives against the backdrop of an extraordinary adventure.
author: Jon Favreau

quote: I can't begin to tell you how fulfilling the perennial nature of 'Elf' on television has been for me. It's great to be able to connect parents with children both emotionally and through humor.
author: Jon Favreau

quote: Wit is an explosion of the compound spirit.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: Working on newspapers, you're writing to a certain length, often very brief pieces; you tend to look for easy forms of humor - women can't drive, things like that. That's about the level of a lot of newspaper humor. It becomes a form of laziness.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: I think 'Country Girl' is one song that can veer into country or hip-hop or rap. You can listen to it and enjoy the humor and the fun in it.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: I like bawdy humor. I love bawdy humor, but not dirty humor.
author: Betty White

quote: Sometimes you can take those dramatic roles and maybe interject a little humor into them, and I think the reverse also works.
author: Dennis Farina

quote: When I've had to edit my albums, I'll listen to it one time through, and I'll make edits. I want to remember to set up a camera to record myself listening to my set, because I don't even slightly crack a smile, I am just listening for technical details, and I look like somebody that has absolutely no sense of humor. I look insane.
author: Tig Notaro

quote: My paintings capture the humor, zaniness, and depth of the Batman villains as well as the Freudian motivations of Batman as an all-too-human, venerable, and funny vigilante superhero.
author: Adam West

quote: I get called 'Mayor West' a lot in airports. I've been very fortunate to have a fan base that keeps growing, and the work gets such a warm response and humor from people.
author: Adam West

quote: I've hung on for a long time in this business and had some success, and I think it's keeping an open mind and being curious and having a sense of humor about oneself that's important.
author: Adam West

quote: I do not have a sense of humor of any recognizable sort.
author: Tommy Lee Jones

quote: I admired Stephen Daldry very much; I think he's a brilliant director, and also, I feel close to him because he has a lot of theater behind him. He's also a man of great imagination and a lovely sense of humor.
author: Max von Sydow

quote: Ingmar Bergman had a great sense of humor, and he had a very special, characteristic laugh that you always recognized - if he went to watch a theater show, 'Ah! He is here tonight.'
author: Max von Sydow

quote: I am a political human being. I have - that's one of my interests. I studied political science in college. I was actually going to get my Ph.D. in poli-sci. And a lot of my material from early on in my career dealt with politics, so I've always considered myself as somebody who enjoys political humor. So I'm not going to stop.
author: Maz Jobrani

quote: Humor is always important. There are people who help us deal with difficulty or hardship; from the concentration camps to the court jester, there was a need for humor. As long as these kinds of things exist, with repressive regimes, you need it to deal with the weight of daily life.
author: Maz Jobrani

quote: You have to laugh at yourself. I do a lot of humor about all ethnicities that are at the show - Latinos, Asians, Indians... What I say is, 'We're laughing together. I'm laughing with you, not at you.' Never say, 'Oh, I'm better than you.'
author: Maz Jobrani

quote: I think the main thing about comedy and humor is that it's impossible and always was impossible to define.
author: Mike Nichols

quote: The people in New York - their humor is on a level that goes, uh, very deep, you know?
author: Elaine Stritch

quote: I compare Stephen Sondheim with humor, because humor is unanalyzable. You can't analyze humor. You just have to get through it.
author: Elaine Stritch

quote: Life is never all one thing. It bounces around. Certainly, my own life has. Look at Woody Allen's funny movies - all the humor comes out of sad stuff. Sometimes you have to laugh, no matter what life deals you.
author: Tim O'Brien

quote: Love, as wonderful and horrible as it is, has at its center a kind of pitiful humor.
author: Tim O'Brien

quote: I love the diversity of America. I love the plain, normal sense of humor Americans have. It is not wicked, like in some countries. And I also love how new America is.
author: Antonio Banderas

quote: From sixteen to twenty, all women, kept in humor by their hopes and by their attractions, appear to be good-natured.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: Married people should not be quick to hear what is said by either when in ill humor.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: I think humor can be an effective way of getting the point across, but there are definitely times where I just write very earnestly.
author: Alex Pareene

quote: I don't know if I realized that I was funny, but I realized how healing and important humor was in my childhood.
author: Bonnie Hunt

quote: There's humor in everything. There's gotta be humor in everything.
author: Amy Sedaris

quote: There is also this benefit in brag, that the speaker is unconsciously expressing his own ideal. Humor him by all means, draw it all out, and hold him to it.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Me and Matt love to argue, but in general our sense of humor is pretty much alike.
author: Trey Parker

quote: The thing about For Better or Worse is the only thing that made me an okay director for that is that I have a sense of humor, and it was supposed to be funny.
author: Jason Alexander

quote: I have such a respect for comedy. It's a lot harder than doing drama, in my opinion; you have to have sort of an innate sense of humor. There are rules to comedy you can learn. But ultimately, it really does require a certain point of view on the world, and that really does appeal to me.
author: Elizabeth Banks

quote: Everybody in my family had a real sick, twisted sense of humor. Most of the jokes we make in our house, we would just never even dream of making anywhere else. Just sick, horrible stuff. That wasn't anything new to college.
author: Seth MacFarlane

quote: Having a sense of humor has served me more than it has hurt me - just in the sense that it has allowed me to keep my sanity.
author: Dee Dee Myers

quote: There's a film I did years ago, 'Love Serenade,' that I still really love. It's such an oddball sense of humor. It was a really special film for me when I did it.
author: Miranda Otto

quote: What's great about the geek spirit is that life never seems to stop us, and they never seem to kill our enthusiasm, our optimism and our hunger to experience the world. We keep our sense of humor, we protect our dignity, we talk to our friends about the experience and then we start again fresh the very next day.
author: Paul Feig

quote: Women's humor seems to be a little more supportive. It's just kind of trying to make the other one laugh through funny voices and kind of talking about other people. I respond to that. I feel less like I'm going to get beat up in a room full of women than I do in a room full of guys.
author: Paul Feig

quote: In Australia, even the darkest subject matter has a little pinch of humor. A little sweet to make the sour go down.
author: Ben Mendelsohn

quote: I'm sure there are people who survive tragedy without humor, but I've never met any of them. Nor would I be particularly interested in writing about them if I did meet them.
author: Ayelet Waldman

quote: I do talk about celebrity relationships like Kim Kardashian's. I like to find the humor in love.
author: Loni Love

quote: I like to be able to feel as many parts of myself while watching a movie at one time. I think that's what 'Super' is - it's funny, but it's also sad. It's very touching in certain ways, and it's also got a very dark sense of humor. So it's allowed to go anywhere.
author: James Gunn

quote: There are different kinds of humor, some is sarcastic, some introspective. Introspective fit my personality better.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Kindness is really important to me in finding my own prince - so are patience and a sense of humor. Without those qualities he's no Prince Charming!
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: I personally have dealt with any adversity in my life with humor. That's why I told America to 'Read my hips!' on 'Dancing With the Stars' or was happy to play along with Jason Alexander and Jerry Seinfeld in the great restaurant scene on 'Seinfeld.'
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Humor comes in all forms, and everyone has their cup of tea about what makes them laugh. But the day we censor humor is a sad one for sure.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: I need a woman to have a quirky sense of humor. There's a bunch of jokes I use, and if she doesn't get them, she's probably not for me.
author: Matthew Perry

quote: I was intentionally curbing the impulse to be funny and hiding the ability. I wrote any number of very serious attempts at poems, short stories, novels - horrible. At a certain point, I recognized that it was fun to write dialogue that had a degree of lightness and humor.
author: Patrick deWitt

quote: I use a lot of humor, and I follow the saying that if you want to tell people the truth, you better make them laugh first; otherwise, they will shoot you.
author: Sayed Kashua

quote: Mixing humor and politics is something that works.
author: Bryan Cranston

quote: I read the script and decide if a particular character looks fun to play. I look for complexity and a sense of humor. Those are crucial, real things to life.
author: Steve Buscemi

quote: I just like playing interesting, complex, complicated characters. I like films that also have an element of humor.
author: Steve Buscemi

quote: You either have chemistry or you don't, but a lot of what attracts me is a guy's mind and humor and talent. I need to get to know all those things before I fall for someone.
author: Nina Dobrev

quote: The only way I could get comfortable around people was to make them laugh. I was an obedient girl, and humor was my one form of rebellion. I used comedy to deflect. Like, 'Hey, check out my zit!' - you know, making fun of yourself before someone else has a chance to.
author: Tina Fey

quote: I loved Peter Sellers. I thought he was the perfect mix of physical comedy with out-of-the-box humor. I loved his tone I loved his physicality I loved everything about what he was doing as a comedic actor.
author: J. B. Smoove

quote: I love British humor. It's just so - surreal.
author: Beck

quote: When I was young, my favorite picture book was 'Fletcher and Zenobia,' written by Edward Gorey and illustrated by Victoria Chess. It's long out of print now, but its mix of macabre humor and 1960s psychedelia made it a perfect children's book for the times.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: I like guys with a sense of humor who smile a lot and are kind.
author: Nikki Glaser

quote: As far as how I approach the humor, I think the best comedy is going to happen when I'm myself and act organically to a news item or situation.
author: Nikki Glaser

quote: All my relatives and friends have been pretty aware of my brand of humor for a while, so none of them have been shocked.
author: Nikki Glaser

quote: Humor can bring people under the tent. And a good joke can deflect some of the intensity surrounding a serious subject.
author: Ted Danson

quote: I've always had a sick sense of humor, and I've always wanted that to permeate the music because I don't take myself seriously. I take the music seriously, but I know I'm not God's gift to anyone except my mom.
author: Josh Homme

quote: I don't have a caustic sense of humor. What I find funny, that humor comes from a much gentler place.
author: Vera Farmiga

quote: I think God gave us senses of humor, and we should use them.
author: Vera Farmiga

quote: I'm drawn to the unconventional because I've been drawn unconventionally. I believe that I'm supposed to topple over these false images of what's idealistically beautiful. Because, of course, these intangible qualities are very attractive to women. Sincerity. Sense of humor. Success.
author: CeeLo Green

quote: I think being a parent is knowing how to love. Sometimes love is discipline, sometimes it's humor, sometimes it's listening.
author: Melissa Etheridge

quote: You see, that's another thing that my parents gave me: an enormously great sense of humor.
author: Liza Minnelli

quote: I just am a snob when it comes to humor.
author: Courteney Cox

quote: Humor is a wonderful way to deal with our suffering because if we can laugh at our troubles, we can feel better. Thich Nhat Hanh is a special man who has helped millions with their suffering with incredible technique. But he doesn't know real suffering, because he has not dated as much as I have.
author: Garry Shandling

quote: I have this horrible sense of humor where I think discomfort is funny - partly because I experience discomfort a lot, and it's a way of laughing at it and getting a release.
author: Joaquin Phoenix

quote: Some people say my humor focuses too much on stereotypes. It doesn't. It focuses on facts.
author: Sarah Silverman

quote: The darker the film, the more vital everyone's sense of humor is on set.
author: Eric Bana

quote: I think, in our darkest moments, you have to find the humor, and you have to find the lightness.
author: Corey Hawkins

quote: Humor is richly rewarding to the person who employs it. It has some value in gaining and holding attention, but it has no persuasive value at all.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: A lot of stars don't have a sense of humor.
author: Kathy Griffin

quote: My fam is just a regular family. But all of them have great senses of humor.
author: Dane Cook

quote: For me, whenever I would see a lot of 'black films,' I didn't feel represented in it. I didn't feel connected to the characters or the situations or the humor.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: I'm happy to say that at 62, I think I've reached that point where stuff doesn't bother me as much, and my gratitude level has gone way up, especially having gone through the loss that I've had, and losing so many of the great artists that I was close to. They taught me how to see it with a grain of salt and a lot of humor and perspective.
author: Bonnie Raitt

quote: One of my favorite things about 'Star Trek' wasn't just the overt banter but the humor in that show about the relationships between the main characters and their reactions to the situations they would face there was a lot of comedy in that show without ever breaking its reality.
author: J. J. Abrams

quote: I find that people find a way out of misery through humor and it's humor that's often unacceptable to people who are not in quite such a state of misery.
author: Danny Boyle

quote: Being Jewish is a big part of my artistic sensibility and my humor... I think it gives me a certain take on the world on a literary level.
author: Adam Mansbach

quote: I always thought the biggest failing of Americans was their lack of irony. They are very serious there! Naturally, there are exceptions... the Jewish, Italian, and Irish humor of the East Coast.
author: Colin Firth

quote: I realized women and humor were linked very closely.
author: Craig Ferguson

quote: It's hard to force creativity and humor.
author: Al Yankovic

quote: No mind is thoroughly well organized that is deficient in a sense of humor.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: To me, Ann Romney sounds like a better candidate than her husband. She put her MS into remission through horseback riding, alternative therapies, and a healthy diet. She knows how to pace herself. She has a sense of humor and an innate honesty, and her hair moves in the wind. Maybe she should run.
author: Patti Davis

quote: Texas humor and Southern humor are pretty similar.
author: Daniel Woodrell

quote: People are wired for lots of things. We're wired for novelty. We're wired for humor. We're wired for new pieces of information that surprise us in some way or add value to our lives. We're wired for fear.
author: Ramez Naam

quote: I don't think I could ever do a network sitcom because the humor is often based on some trite circumstance. I don't want to be a part of a show where it's mostly about coming up with the jokes.
author: Sherilyn Fenn

quote: Feature-length film comedy is harder to pull off than the episodic sitcom - it doesn't have the same factory machinery up and running, teams of writers putting familiar characters through permutations - but that doesn't explain the widening quality gap that makes movie humor look like a genetic defective.
author: James Wolcott

quote: I don't happen to have a sense of humor personally, so I don't know what's funny about a character... This happens to be a feature of my life generally.
author: Wallace Shawn

quote: Jon Stewart, Bill Maher, Stephen Colbert. Those are the guys I look at who are telling me pretty much the truth. And they throw humor into it which makes it much more interesting to listen to.
author: Grace Slick

quote: Humor is such a wonderful thing, helping you realize what a fool you are but how beautiful that is at the same time.
author: Lynda Barry

quote: I've always thought my strengths were I'm smart, and I have a good sense of humor. I definitely struggle with feeling confident.
author: Lauren Graham

quote: I'm a humor writer, so I don't always present myself in the best light.
author: Jen Lancaster

quote: Humor's an excellent way to make a point more palatable and/or relatable.
author: Jen Lancaster

quote: 'The Sundial' is written with the kind of humor that would make a guillotine laugh.
author: Victor LaValle

quote: I quite like dark humor.
author: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: Sure, I am funny and have a good sense of humor. Mostly, though, I just tell the truth. The internal dialogue people have in their heads - I just write it.
author: Kara Swisher

quote: I don't feel that I'm strictly Danish I don't feel that my sense of humor is strictly Danish or my human sensibility is strictly Danish.
author: Susanne Bier

quote: For me, humor is everything!
author: Judy Gold

quote: Mother humor is such a universal theme. I wrote a show called '25 Questions for a Jewish Mother.' I had people coming up to me after the show saying, 'I'm Baptist, and my mother is just like yours.'
author: Judy Gold

quote: I love the vulgar. I kind of have the humor of a 17-year-old boy.
author: Judy Gold

quote: If you're that hypersensitive about color and don't have a sense of humor, don't marry out of your race.
author: Laura Schlessinger

quote: The total absence of humor from the Bible is one of the most singular things in all literature.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: When I look at a lot of older stuff that I've written, I think one sign of amateur humor writing is when you see people trying too hard.
author: David Sedaris

quote: My stories are very somber, so I think I need the comic ingredient. Besides, life has so much humor.
author: Manuel Puig

quote: I don't think humor is forced upon my universe it's a part of it.
author: Manuel Puig

quote: I got my sense of humor from my grandmother. You know, my grandmother was very funny.
author: Paul Mooney

quote: From an early age onward, it was said that 'Ingmar has no sense of humor.'
author: Ingmar Bergman

quote: Most of the people in my family were pretty funny. Everyone had a good sense of humor. I came to California right after college, wanting to be a musician.
author: Andy Kindler

quote: I get asked, 'How can you have such failures in your films?' Well, what else is life about? There's some sense of constant failure in something. Humor gives you a distance from it.
author: Alexander Payne

quote: I don't really have a type. I don't want to be a cliche. But personality is a big thing for me. You can find cute guys all over. But he's got to have some sort of sense of humor, which is so hard to find in a guy. He's got to be a bit smart.
author: Zara Larsson

quote: Religious humor is not really my area, so I probably wouldn't do anything about that, or politics or something.
author: Chris Lilley

quote: I think God has a tremendous sense of humor.
author: Rainn Wilson

quote: I like being a Baha'i who has an out-there sense of humor. God gives us talents and faculties, and making people laugh is one of mine.
author: Rainn Wilson

quote: I love Sell Out, I think it's great. I love the jingles. The whole thing as an album is a wonderful piece of work. The cover. Everything about it. It's got humor, great songs, irony.
author: Roger Daltrey

quote: Certainly my personality, my sense of humor, my outlook on life was informed by the experiences of my parents and the stories they shared with me.
author: Geddy Lee

quote: Without a sense of humor, I would have been gone a long time ago.
author: Patty Duke

quote: In the 'Hurt Locker' there's a lot of me in there, a sense of humor, a man of few words and a lot of action.
author: Jeremy Renner

quote: I often have said that to be a college president, you need a thick skin, a good sense of humor, and nerves like sewer pipes.
author: Gordon Gee

quote: I tend to deal with most issues with humor... always have and always will.
author: Gordon Gee

quote: The biggest void that people can have in their lives is a sense of humor. Spending your life with someone who doesn't have that wouldn't be palatable.
author: Howie Mandel

quote: I think the thrust of any child is to try to fit in and be part of it. And I can't tell you how many times my humor, you know, what I thought was humor ended up making me the outsider. Like I'd be, I go, 'It's a joke.' And they'd go, 'Well, what was funny?' And they just thought I was insane.
author: Howie Mandel

quote: Part of my humor is the fact that I love coming out of left field. I don't want people to expect what is going to happen next.
author: Howie Mandel

quote: In conversation, humor is worth more than wit and easiness more than knowledge.
author: George Herbert

quote: I like doing comedy, I like doing drama. Naturally I like to do, I like doing dramas, I like conflict, and when I do a comedy, you know, I've found that, like, romantic comedy is the trickiest one, because often it's neither: it's not romantic and it's not funny. So, like, I like a comedy that's biting. It's biting humor or really quirky humor.
author: Matt Dillon

quote: Our ability to find humor in the world, to make connections between previously unconnected notions, to create new ideas, to share in a common culture: All these essentially human acts depend on memory.
author: Joshua Foer

quote: I can't not find humor in elements of most parts of life, but at the same time nothing ever seems perpetually funny to me.
author: Greg Kinnear

quote: I wasn't the sharpest tool in the shed, and I wasn't the biggest, so I got real good at running my mouth and making people laugh and using humor as a way to not get into fights.
author: Rob Riggle

quote: Philip Larkin has a tough honesty and sense of humor that I find irresistible, as a contemporary poet.
author: Robert Morgan

quote: You know, I'm Australian, and we have got the worst sense of humor. We are cruel to each other.
author: Steve Irwin

quote: I tried to go out for theater or theater arts, but I was too scared or too intimidated. But I had a lot of friends on the cross country team that had great senses of humor.
author: Dana Carvey

quote: If you stop and think about it, nearly all great humor is at the expense of someone or something.
author: Alan King

quote: And humor has always been a weapon. You want to get even on somebody? You want to attack somebody? Make fun of them.
author: Alan King

quote: There's a charm, there's a rhythm, there's a soul to Jewish humor. When I first saw Richard Pryor perform, I told him, 'You're doing a Jewish act.'
author: Alan King

quote: What we're doing is fun - if you have any sense of humor at all!
author: Calvin Klein

quote: I like to deal with EVERY aspect of our condition, and that means terror and humor in equal mix. Some books have more room for humor than others.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: I need a man with a good sense of humor and a kind heart.
author: Joanna Krupa

quote: I like Strahan a lot. I've known him for years. He was a Giant here - in many ways. Had a big following with the New York Giants. He's very funny. He's got a great sense of humor.
author: Regis Philbin

quote: I'm a pretty tenacious person; I get that from my mom. So sometimes, I use dark humor. I can't take myself too seriously.
author: Art Alexakis

quote: Life is just so much fun and so filled with humor.
author: Foster Friess

quote: I would say just start writing. You've got to write every day. Copy someone that you like if you think that perhaps could become your sound, too. I did that with Hemingway, and I thought I was writing just like Hemingway. Then all of a sudden it occurred to me - he didn't have a sense of humor. I don't know anything he's written that's funny.
author: Elmore Leonard

quote: Humor reminds you, when you're flattened by sorrow, that you're still human.
author: Elizabeth McCracken

quote: You write the way you think about the world. My motto in times of trouble - and I'm speaking of life, not writing - is 'no humor too black.'
author: Elizabeth McCracken

quote: People come up to me as I leave the stage after a performance and tell me tey saw my mother onstage with me every time I sing. I keep a sense of humor about it.
author: Lorna Luft

quote: Short fiction is like low relief. And if your story has no humor in it, then you're trying to look at something in the pitch dark. With the light of humor, it throws what you're writing into relief so that you can actually see it.
author: Elizabeth McCracken

quote: There are two MFA programs here at the University of Texas, and I read on the jury of both of them. And it's amazing to me how many really talented young writers seem to fear humor.
author: Elizabeth McCracken

quote: A lot of people into Tool, for some reason, are not interested in humor.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: If golf wasn't enjoyable and there wasn't a lot of humor and enjoyment, even though the game is so frustrating, you would wonder why you put yourself through it.
author: Ray Romano

quote: The comics that are just conversing with you up there and drawing on their own life, yeah, I guess so. I guess some do political humor, some do topical humor, but the ones that I like, the ones that are appealing to me, were guys who were just talking to you about their life.
author: Ray Romano

quote: I never worry about people not taking my work seriously as a result of the humor. In the end, the comic's best trick is the illusion that comedy is effortless. That people imagine what he's doing is easy is an occupational hazard.
author: Richard Russo

quote: Quite often, intent on conveying how things can go wrong for a culture (science fiction) or an individual (horror) or all of magical creation (fantasy), works of fantastika often preclude comedy, because humor gets in the way of messages of doom or struggle.
author: Paul Di Filippo

quote: All I know about humor is that I don't know anything about it.
author: Fred Allen

quote: I've heard too many times where people say that I'm this ultra-serious guy. In truth, I've got an extremely absurd sense of humor. I thrive on the absurd - I love it.
author: Phil Anselmo

quote: My own life is wonderful, but if I had to live the life of someone else, I'd gladly choose that of Julia Child or Dr. Seuss: two outrageously original people, each of whom fashioned an idiosyncratic wisdom, passion for life, and sense of humor into an art form that anyone and everyone could savor.
author: Julia Glass

quote: Yes, I have a good sense of humor to sort of last a long time in show business, and I think to be able to find comedic value in who you are and the people that you work is always a good thing.
author: Jane Krakowski

quote: I think it's hilarious at 40 years old to bring out my roller skates from 'Starlight Express.' I find the humor and even the sadness in it hilarious and something to celebrate.
author: Jane Krakowski

quote: With Ricky Gervais, it's all shades of wrong, it's my kind of humor.
author: Emily Blunt

quote: It's just my natural way - to be funny. I don't know why that is. But as I've said, humor is a quick cover for shock, horror, confusion. The critics hate funny writers for the most part. They think funny is not serious, but I think that funny can be even more serious than nonfunny. And it can be more affecting, too.
author: T. C. Boyle

quote: If I ever have sex with someone I might be able to develop a sense of humor.
author: Kate Beckinsale

quote: To me, sadness and humor aren't disrelated and humor is the best tool I've had against the sadness in my life.
author: Mike Mills

quote: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: Sometimes a scene may be about one thing, and it may end up still being about that, but the emotionality of it comes from somewhere else, or the humor of it comes from somewhere else, and it gives it that real-life quality.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: I really hate sitcoms on television with canned laughter and stuff. What really makes me laugh is the real-life stuff. I've got a dry sense of humor.
author: Katie Price

quote: I wish I could be as thin as Jessica Simpson. I think she looks gorgeous! I have had Jessica on my show several times, and I can tell you that girl is genuine and funny with a great self-deprecating sense of humor.
author: Rachael Ray

quote: It's continuously humbling to work hard, you know? As long as you've got a good work ethic and a sense of humor, I don't think anybody can become too much of an egoist under those circumstances.
author: Rachael Ray

quote: Laughter is involuntary. If it's funny you laugh.
author: Tom Lehrer

quote: My books are shelved in different places, depending on the bookstore. Sometimes they can be found in the Mystery section, sometimes in the Humor department, and occasionally even in the Literature aisle, which is somewhat astounding.
author: Carl Hiaasen

quote: Humor can be an incredible lacerating and effective weapon. And that is the way I use it.
author: Carl Hiaasen

quote: Daddy was hilarious. He could take the most mundane event and tell it so that we all on the floor laughing. He trained me in the joys of humor.
author: Karen DeCrow

quote: I like dark humor. My favorite movie of all time is 'Harold and Maude.'
author: Leslie Mann

quote: Humor is the only way to tell a story. Especially the dark ones.
author: Lisa Lutz

quote: I've always adored the filmmaker Sam Fuller. The first time I watched 'Shock Corridor' was such a magnificent discovery. I love his lack of subtlety, the way he tackles serious topics with bold and inappropriate humor.
author: Lisa Lutz

quote: Every time I've done comedy in, like, traditional comedy clubs, there's always these comedians that do really well with audiences but that the other comedians hate because they're just, you know, doing kind of cheap stuff like dancing around or doing, like, very kind of base sex humor a lot, and stuff like that.
author: Aziz Ansari

quote: Over the years, I've learned that a sense of humor is the only skill that allows you to turn sucking at life into a career.
author: Zach Anner

quote: My childhood was great because my family has an amazing sense of humor, and it was just all making videos and jokes and doing skits and things.
author: Zach Anner

quote: My parents and my brother instilled in me my sense of humor. That's kind of the way we communicate with each other, and it's always been a way for me to get to know people.
author: Zach Anner

quote: Depending on where my self-confidence was, growing up, I would use humor either to bring people closer, or to keep them away from certain feelings I had.
author: Zach Anner

quote: Humor disarms people. It opens them up to starting a dialogue about things they wouldn't normally talk about. I don't understand how people who don't have a sense of humor get through life.
author: Zach Anner

quote: Even when something sad or tragic happens, I find a way to look at it in a positive light. People who don't have a sense of humor must be so sad all the time.
author: Zach Anner

quote: It's amazing how many companies aren't really in tune to the needs of different travelers. There's just so many embarrassing situations that you go through when you travel. You have to have a sense of humor about it and take it in stride. My whole approach is to embrace spontaneity.
author: Zach Anner

quote: People who know me know I have a sense of humor that can really push the envelope.
author: Carmen Electra

quote: I was always silly in high school. I used to always get in trouble because I was laughing. I've always thought I was funny but never thought I could use it to make money. In 1996, I decided I was going to use my humor to get on TV to make money.
author: Retta

quote: My humor is a lot like Kristen Wiig's from 'Saturday Night Live' or 'Bridesmaids.' Quirky, off the beaten path.
author: Nicole Ari Parker

quote: Every black film feels like it's Tyler Perry, and that just needs to stop. But people seem to slowly be looking for what else is out there - 'Is there something else besides this type of humor?' 'I'm tired of seeing men in dresses.'
author: Issa Rae

quote: Puns are a form of humor with words.
author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

quote: I don't know if my sense of humor goes over Americans' heads.
author: Ryan Kwanten

quote: I make fun of situations and try and find the humor in things, but it's never at the expense of the other guy.
author: Bob Uecker

quote: I've always been a fan of a Johnny Carson because he was so great with an audience and not afraid of self-deprecating humor.
author: Vince Vaughn

quote: For the most part, comedians are pretty friendly with each other. They always say they badmouth each other, but most of the time, they're friends. We're the only ones that can really stand our type of humor.
author: Colin Quinn

quote: Jerry Seinfeld is amazing in many ways, not the least of them his ability to find humor, and convincing us to find it, too, in the million-and-two details about modern life that under different circumstances might send us into paroxysms of rage.
author: Tom Shales

quote: My parents have always had a great sense of humor. And I really appreciate good humor in songs, witty lyrics that sneak up on you and then you listen again, and say: 'That's so funny.' John Prine's songs have always had this really witty tone.
author: Kacey Musgraves

quote: If you're playing a good guy, you show some darkness. If you're playing a dark guy, you show something different, like humor, that will mix it up and hopefully surpass the audience's expectations. What I'm battling all the time is complacency in the audience. I try to bring a little mystery to what might happen because that engages people more.
author: Campbell Scott

quote: Well, darkness with humor... I'm not an extremely suicidal or sad person.
author: Peter Steele

quote: As far as humor goes, I've always been a very insecure person and I've always wanted to be liked.
author: Peter Steele

quote: The woman who runs the Pennsylvania Innocence Project told me that there's a man she's been trying to get out of prison for 26 years. Every night before she goes to bed, she thinks, 'What is he doing?' She says you don't sleep. And yet, she has the greatest sense of humor and this light that comes out of her.
author: Richard LaGravenese

quote: You probably found 'How to Survive a Robot Uprising' in the humor section. Let's just hope that is where it belongs.
author: Daniel H. Wilson

quote: There was a time I was very much blaming the way I felt on L.A, that it was a vacuum of creativity, of humor or anything organic, and I was really angry at the place. But then today I feel completely different - I love L.A.!
author: Naomi Watts

quote: You've got to have a sense of humor to keep your sanity.
author: Lance Bass

quote: I have wit in my work and a sense of humor, but I do not use irony in any way.
author: John Zorn

quote: I think in my case, I had no choice but to have a good sense of humor. I grew up with my dad, Danny Thomas, and George Burns and Bob Hope and Milton Berle and Sid Caesar and all those guys were at our house all the time and telling jokes and making each other laugh.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: The rejection that we all take and the sadness and the aggravation and the loss of jobs and all of the things that we live through in our lives, without a sense of humor, I don't know how people make it.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: I'm a comedian, and I have my share of anxiety and depression; so do most of my friends. My humor tends to lie in the juxtaposition of extreme lightness - I'm a huge musical-theater fan - and extreme darkness. And so I really like playing with those because that's how I feel.
author: Rachel Bloom

quote: I'm not sure. But that bless-his/her-heart kind of melancholic humor is among my favorite things in the world. I guess it exposes a kind of humanity - or that's the hope, at least - a kind of grudging respect for human frailty. Unless it's actually kicking human frailty while it's down - I'm not sure.
author: David Rakoff

quote: I'm looking at some comedic horror films because I have often been accused of being too dark. I'm not dark, not compared with 'Saw' or anything like that. So I'm looking at live-action horror films, but not slasher ones - ones that have humor and maybe some social satire.
author: Henry Selick

quote: It's amazing how these little guys can say things that a mortal human could never get away with. There's some sort of unspoken license... when outlandish things come out of an inanimate object, somehow it equals humor.
author: Jeff Dunham

quote: I've worked a lot in comedy. As much as I love playing dramatic roles, it's always nice to be able to have some humor around when working.
author: Tom Ellis

quote: Lucifer has a sense of fun about life he just likes to play with people. But the sense of humor of the show is what makes the show entertaining as opposed to dark.
author: Tom Ellis

quote: There's some sort of unspoken license... when outlandish things come out of an inanimate object, somehow it equals humor.
author: Jeff Dunham

quote: It is characteristic of all deep human problems that they are not to be approached without some humor and some bewilderment.
author: Freeman Dyson

quote: Reilly Brown is a master of balancing action, humor, and extreme violence, and his character designs for some of the alien races and technology that we encounter is just amazing.
author: Cullen Bunn

quote: I can't be as open on national television as I can when I'm having dinner with friends. But that doesn't mean the type of person I am is different. My values, my dislikes, my sense of humor are the same.
author: Matt Lauer

quote: Be fun! I don't like homes or rooms that don't have a sense of humor or have some sense of whimsy or a personality. Your home should reflect who you are, and what you love. I would never have something in my home because it's the thing to have. I have to love it and it needs some connection to me.
author: Bryan Batt

quote: My parents and my sister died... very close together, and after that, I lost quite a bit of my sense of humor. Most of it I think has kind of come back, but I know there was a time when I didn't think things were funny anymore. I kind of think they're funny again.
author: Thomas McGuane

quote: God has a most wicked sense of humor.
author: Maureen O'Hara

quote: Bathroom humor, fart, and poo poo humor in movies gets a laugh. It's a pretty easy audience, and that's been around for ages.
author: Selma Blair

quote: I learned early in my career to not let myself get in the way of humor but, instead, find what is great in a talented person.
author: Tamra Davis

quote: I always had to genuinely like the actors I worked with and use my enthusiasm and vision to give them confidence to push their creativity and their humor.
author: Tamra Davis

quote: My humor tends to be a little more edgy than is appropriate for 'Twilight,' although I got some in there. That was fun! There's just a tonal difference. For me, storytelling is storytelling. But, I do like writing for grown ups.
author: Melissa Rosenberg

quote: Don't wish me happiness - I don't expect to be happy it's gotten beyond that, somehow. Wish me courage and strength and a sense of humor - I will need them all.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: The way humor's usually used in horror, it's as a pressure-release valve; without it, the drama would escalate out of all control almost immediately.
author: Stephen Graham Jones

quote: Whatever else an American believes or disbelieves about himself, he is absolutely sure he has a sense of humor.
author: E. B. White

quote: When you meet someone new who instantly gets you, your sense of humor and your attitudes and your worldview, even if theirs are different - and you get them in return. You both talk and talk and agree and laugh and nod and yes, yes, of course you should get another round of drinks.
author: Erin Morgenstern

quote: You can't be funny if you don't have good material.
author: Matt LeBlanc

quote: Both conservatives and liberals watch 'Parks and Recreation,' and they each think the show is for them, which is really cool. 'SNL' was totally different. It was exciting because everyone was paying attention. Political humor works when people know what you're talking about.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: Humor is perhaps a sense of intellectual perspective: an awareness that some things are really important, others not; and that the two kinds are most oddly jumbled in everyday affairs.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: There are so many things to talk about between black people, Hispanic people, white people, gay people, men, women, it's all based on fear. We all have fears, this thing that stops us from embracing as we are one. We are never going to be one. People are messed up, but humor lets us see how ignorant we can be.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: You learn timing on the road. You learn structure and how to read an audience. You learn so much about the business of laughter that you can't learn on a set, because it's all on you. Sometimes you bomb, and you know not to tell that joke again... You just hope people find the humor in the awkwardness.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: It felt as if things were literally slipping through my fingers. Things were just streaming away from me. I lost my sense of humor. I'm still looking for that.
author: Michelle Williams

quote: With actors like Steve McQueen, Paul Newman and Harrison Ford, what made them such icons is that even in dramatic movies, their characters had a sense of humor.
author: Patrick Wilson

quote: I try to cope with everything through humor.
author: Gail Porter

quote: I came into the 'Comedy Bang! Bang!' TV show with a level of confidence that I don't think I would've had if I hadn't been doing the podcast for three years already. I certainly had to figure out in those three years the sense of humor I wanted to do and the way to talk to celebrities without being incredibly intimidated by them.
author: Scott Aukerman

quote: If I can't see the humor in it, how am I going to be funny?
author: Casey Affleck

quote: The guys in my band are great-we watch movies, we eat pizza, take walks, read books. Everybody has a really great sense of humor. And my boyfriend comes and visits me on the road.
author: Lisa Loeb

quote: Any film which views the darker side of life, which is death with a sense of humor, is very much to my taste.
author: Carter Burwell

quote: If somebody is not on the same page with me humor wise, I can't give them that.
author: Stephan Pastis

quote: Brits have a better sense of humor in most ways. It's darker, more cutting.
author: Stephan Pastis

quote: Maybe the bar is low, but most of the strips that are 50, 60, 70 years old that are on their second or third generation of artists, the humor is pretty bland. There are others by people that were raised on 'Family Guy' or 'South Park' that are edgier. Mine's not as edgy as those, but it's edgier than 'Beetle Bailey.'
author: Stephan Pastis

quote: Thomas, my 15-year-old, is effectively my editor, I've always trusted his voice, more than anybody, on the strip for years. He has one of those ears that's just tuned to the rhythm of humor, so if he says something's not funny, my stomach just hurts because I know he's right, and it's already been drawn.
author: Stephan Pastis

quote: I think there's always room for humor, especially when you're talking about really serious issues.
author: Jay Asher

quote: I thought I was going to be known for my humor. But then I had an idea for a story, which was absolutely not humorous. But, of course, that's the one that sells and becomes big.
author: Jay Asher

quote: It's always amazed me how little attention philosophers, psychologists, or anyone else actually has paid to humor.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: I still haven't found the humor in getting hit by a cement truck. My knees still hurt when I think about it, so no jokes about that yet.
author: Adam DeVine

quote: I think sometimes my humor is extremely dry, and a lot of times I would say things that I thought were very funny but... I have a reputation of - people think of me as a very fundamentalist, humorless fellow.
author: Ian MacKaye

quote: Humor does not diminish the pain - it makes the space around it get bigger.
author: Allen Klein

quote: When you do find humor in trying times, one of the first and most important changes you experience is that you see your perplexing problems in a new way - you suddenly have a new perspective on them.
author: Allen Klein

quote: When we are dealing with death we are constantly being dragged down by the event: Humor diverts our attention and lifts our sagging spirits.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Whether planned or not, humor takes our mind off of our troubles.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Any attempts at humor immediately after September 11th were deemed tasteless.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Since the goal of my programs is to show audiences how humor can both help them heal as well as deal with not-so-funny stuff, I decided to discuss the events of the previous week, the pain all of us were feeling, and how humor and some laughter might be beneficial.
author: Allen Klein

quote: In looking for humor, keep in mind this guideline: Sometimes it takes a little time to see the humor in your upsets; you may not find something to laugh about immediately.
author: Allen Klein

quote: When we can find some humor in our upsets, they no longer seem as large or as important as they once did.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Humor expands our limited picture frame and gets us to see more than just our problem.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Humor can inform and break down stigma, which is a huge issue in the military.
author: Garry Trudeau

quote: I wish there were more humor in my work than I see in it.
author: Jasper Johns

quote: The best way to make your audience laugh is to start laughing yourself.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: People with no humor, they're outta my life.
author: Patti LaBelle

quote: I visited Jobs for the last time in his Palo Alto, Calif., home. He had moved to a downstairs bedroom because he was too weak to go up and down stairs. He was curled up in some pain, but his mind was still sharp and his humor vibrant.
author: Walter Isaacson

quote: Some major writers have a huge impact, like Ayn Rand, who to my mind is a lousy fiction writer because her writing has no compassion and virtually no humor. She has a philosophical and economical message that she is passing off as fiction, but it really isn't fiction at all.
author: Theodore Sturgeon

quote: I think all good drama is funny. All the best drama is ultimately very funny. Life is funny. You can't have any honest treatise on life without bumping into some humor.
author: Thomas Jane

quote: Because I was a television writer for many years, I write very conversationally. I put things straight, and with a lot of humor.
author: Tracy McMillan

quote: Stephen King has inspired me with his humor and honesty, and his admonition that the author's job is to tell the truth.
author: Barry Eisler

quote: There is humor in the darkest of moments - People who I have loved and passed away, and very high stake situations where you can't help but laugh. I think that's very human.
author: Rose McIver

quote: Humor is always more interesting when it comes from someone who's had more than, like, five experiences.
author: Mallory Ortberg

quote: One of the things that would be great is to some day have so many women comedy writers that we wouldn't say there's just one type of female humor. There's lots.
author: Mallory Ortberg

quote: In prehistoric times, mankind often had only two choices in crisis situations: fight or flee. In modern times, humor offers us a third alternative; fight, flee - or laugh.
author: Robert Orben

quote: Humor starts like a wildfire, but then continues on, smoldering, smoldering for years.
author: Robert Orben

quote: I remember when humor was gentle pokes. I used to call it 'arm around the shoulder' humor. Now they go for the jugular and they take no prisoners. It's mean, mean stuff.
author: Robert Orben

quote: President Ford used humor a great deal.
author: Robert Orben

quote: I think that humor is part of what saves us from despair.
author: John Perry Barlow

quote: My dad was a very funny man - he's the one who taught me life would be awfully hard without humor! I'm sure his Irish wit in some way influenced my decision to become an actress.
author: Joan Cusack

quote: I'm a big fan of gallows humor. When my aunt passed away, she was in a coma for a day before my cousins pulled the plug. And the amount of joking and base humor that went on that day around her bed was so insane. It's crazy how people talk when something horrible is happening.
author: Amanda Peet

quote: There are psychological repercussions to illness and we need a little more help to get through the effects not only on the afflicted but on the family. And I think there's even a place for humor in that.
author: Alan Thicke

quote: I don't really like using ridicule as a form of humor.
author: Alison Jackson

quote: A pun is the lowest form of humor, unless you thought of it yourself.
author: Doug Larson

quote: There seems to be no lengths to which humorless people will not go to analyze humor. It seems to worry them.
author: Robert Benchley

quote: I have this idyllic love life, but my mind just won't accept that. I would like to bring a new guy home every night. I try to make humor out of that situation.
author: Jen Kirkman

quote: I will say that as I get older and calmer and quieter in my own self, the one quality in a woman that I find more and more attractive is kindness. A sense of adventure and humor is important too, but I truly find kindness and consideration for others to be the most attractive thing in anyone.
author: Colin Farrell

quote: I'll do humor about myself, I'll poke fun and everything, but that's me and I can do it to me. I think it's cruel to do it to somebody else.
author: Delta Burke

quote: M*A*S*H offered real characters and everybody identified with them because they had such soul. The humor was intelligent and it always assumed that you had an intellect.
author: Loretta Swit

quote: I think the Canadian sense of humor is dryer than America's and juicier than Britain's. I think it's a cross between the two of them, really.
author: Scott Thompson

quote: I was born in England - though both of my parents are American - and there's something about the 'Muppets' where they have this combination of English and American humor.
author: Nicholas Stoller

quote: There's a lot of movies, and I've made some of them that could be categorized this way, but there's definitely been a trend in animated features of all types to be a little bit cynical, if you will, to have a little bit of 'knowing' humor to them, kind of a wink to the audience.
author: Kelly Asbury

quote: I talk about race and culture, and that's what my fans respond to. If you grew up in an environment where race and culture were never an issue for you, or where you don't see the humor in our so-called differences, then you might not respond to what I'm doing.
author: Russell Peters

quote: Men love it. They have a sense of humor, whereas a lot of women are threatened or just don't get it.
author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quote: Comedy, we may say, is society protecting itself - with a smile.
author: J. B. Priestley

quote: Even celebrities, most people have a sense of humor. Most of the people we meet who we've done on the show, like it.
author: Matt Stone

quote: I love the idea of things being strict and things being uniform. That's the reason why I surround each collection with humor or irony. I want to make sure that it's not too serious and that there is some element that throws it off because otherwise that would make it really boring. There's always a story that's somewhat fantastical.
author: Thom Browne

quote: I wasn't close to my father, but I wanted to be all my life. He had a funny sense of humor, and he laughed all the time - good and loud, like I do. He was a gay Irish gentleman and very good-looking. And he wanted to be close to me, too, but we never had much time together.
author: Judy Garland

quote: What a strange world this would be if we all had the same sense of humor.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: Russian humor is to adapt or make some sense or nonsense out of the insanity of their lives.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: People in Russia adapt to misery by a deep, deep humor.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: I don't have a disregard for my reader in humor pieces.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: I think what is important for things to be funny is if you the listener, or the reader, get a chance to supply the humor of it yourself.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: With reporting, if you work hard, you can usually pull something out. But writing humor doesn't respond to working hard, necessarily. I mean, you could just sit there and look at the page all day and maybe something will come.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: Writing humor for me is more like a watchful-ness. You have to watch. When you say something funny, or someone else does, it's more like you wait for the piece.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: My fans have great senses of humor and eat too much chocolate.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: As a kid, I loved 'Godot' because of the poetry and the humor and the strangeness, but then as you get older, it's much more resonant.
author: Nathan Lane

quote: I think in life, the sense of humor and comedy always exists.
author: Mike Epps

quote: Sometimes Americans don't quite get my sense of humor. My good ol' British sarcasm seems to go over their heads.
author: Lee Westwood

quote: I appreciate humor so much, but I'm actually not a funny girl.
author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

quote: I was a little shocked at how adult some of the humor was, because I was never that into animation before and when I watched 'Shrek' I really laughed out loud.
author: Cheryl Hines

quote: Rowling is a luminous storyteller. I love her sense of humor and the intricate wizarding world she built around Hogwarts. I think all writers aspire to be like her, to capture readers like she does. But I didn't think about 'Harry Potter' when I wrote 'The Bone Season.'
author: Samantha Shannon

quote: I have a very silly sense of humor. I've never laughed harder in my entire life than seeing someone with toilet paper stuck on the bottom of their shoe.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: The love of truth lies at the root of much humor.
author: Robertson Davies

quote: If you look at the game and everything, it's not quite like looking at an animated film, because that's total character. This, this is really movement, but it's got funny little things if you look for the humor. They're actually getting to the character.
author: Don Bluth
