author: Garrison Keillor

quote: I think in a lot of ways unconditional love is a myth. My mom's the only reason I know it's a real thing.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they're making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as punishment. And that's the difference.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: We've got this gift of love, but love is like a precious plant. You can't just accept it and leave it in the cupboard or just think it's going to get on by itself. You've got to keep watering it. You've got to really look after it and nurture it.
author: John Lennon

quote: Life is a game and true love is a trophy.
author: Rufus Wainwright

quote: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.
author: Theodore Zeldin

quote: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
author: Andy Serkis

quote: You give loyalty, you'll get it back. You give love, you'll get it back.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: I believe in soulmates, yes, but I believe you also have to work at love. I happen to believe your soulmate doesn't have to be your partner - your soulmate could be your best friend, your sibling, it doesn't have to be the person you marry.
author: Cheryl Cole

quote: Love is the most important thing in the world, but baseball is pretty good, too.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: I absolutely love spending time with my family.
author: Kevin Alejandro

quote: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
author: Marc Anthony

quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Dare, dream, dance, smile, and sing loudly! And have faith that love is an unstoppable force!
author: Suzanne Brockmann

quote: Communism is not love. Communism is a hammer which we use to crush the enemy.
author: Mao Zedong

quote: I spent a lot of years trying to outrun or outsmart vulnerability by making things certain and definite, black and white, good and bad. My inability to lean into the discomfort of vulnerability limited the fullness of those important experiences that are wrought with uncertainty: Love, belonging, trust, joy, and creativity to name a few.
author: Brene Brown

quote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: I love the smell of rain, and I love the sound of the ocean waves.
author: Amy Purdy

quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: What I am is how I came out. No one's perfect and you just have to accept your flaws and learn to love yourself.
author: Kelly Brook

quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Man must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I love the spirit of Halloween and the energy that comes with it.
author: Katharine McPhee

quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
author: Joyce Giraud

quote: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Singing is my passion, my first love and the secret of my energy. Music to me is like finding my inner self, my soul. It gives me a great joy to see audiences enjoying with me. I have given my heart to singing. When I sing, I can feel romance in everything around me.
author: Kailash Kher

quote: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.
author: Lawrence Welk

quote: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I'm not ashamed to be me. More than anyone else I know, I love my life and accept myself. What's wrong with being unique? I am proud of everything that I am and will become.
author: Johnny Weir

quote: To know yourself as the Being underneath the thinker, the stillness underneath the mental noise, the love and joy underneath the pain, is freedom, salvation, enlightenment.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: I thank God that I'm a product of my parents. That they infected me with their intelligence and energy for life, with their thirst for knowledge and their love. I'm grateful that I know where I come from.
author: Shakira

quote: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: My favorite thing about motherhood is the outpouring of love that is non-judgmental and beautiful. My daughter just makes me happy, and she motivates me to be a kid again.
author: Christina Milian

quote: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: I knew I was going to love my daughter, but I had no idea how much I would love her.
author: Jeremy Sisto

quote: My sister is a mess. I love her to death, but she is a mess.
author: RJ Mitte

quote: You might not make it to the top, but if you are doing what you love, there is much more happiness there than being rich or famous.
author: Tony Hawk

quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: But the love of adventure was in father's blood.
author: Buffalo Bill

quote: I need to see my own beauty and to continue to be reminded that I am enough, that I am worthy of love without effort, that I am beautiful, that the texture of my hair and that the shape of my curves, the size of my lips, the color of my skin, and the feelings that I have are all worthy and okay.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

quote: No one can make you happy. No one can help you grow in life more than you can. I can love you to death, but I can only go so far. I can inspire and encourage you as much as I can, but when you play an active role to find that self-security and that self-worth, it makes the difference.
author: Musiq Soulchild

quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: My eye is ever on those who love me.
author: Sai Baba

quote: In life, you have to take the pace that love goes. You don't force it. You just don't force love, you don't force falling in love, you don't force being in love - you just become. I don't know how to say that in English, but you just feel it.
author: Juan Pablo Galavis

quote: You just have to get rid of fear and confront the world. Look at yourself in the mirror and say to yourself, 'I love you and nothing will destroy you and you're not going to fall.'
author: Ricky Martin

quote: In the stillness of your presence, you can feel your own formless and timeless reality as the unmanifested life that animates your physical form. You can then feel the same life deep within every other human and every other creature. You look beyond the veil of form and separation. This is the realization of oneness. This is love.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I love it when people doubt me. It makes me work harder to prove them wrong.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: We are supposed to enjoy the good stuff now, while we can, with the people we love. Life has a funny way of teaching us that lesson over and over again.
author: Sheena Easton

quote: I trust you: That's huge. That's truth. That's real love. Everyone uses 'I love you' so loosely.
author: Justin Chatwin

quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: In my life I've learned that true happiness comes from giving. Helping others along the way makes you evaluate who you are. I think that love is what we're all searching for. I haven't come across anyone who didn't become a better person through love.
author: Marla Gibbs

quote: We may not know what each day has in store for us. We could be gone tomorrow. Any minute could truly be our goodbye. But we do have this moment. This time. Today. Right now. It takes way more effort to shell out hate then it does to allow love to flow freely in our lives. After all, it's what we were born to do.
author: Grace Gealey

quote: Patriotism is when love of your own people comes first; nationalism, when hate for people other than your own comes first.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
author: Jane Austen

quote: The thing is that love gives us a ringside seat on somebody else's flaws, so of course you're gonna spot some things that kinda need to be mentioned. But often the romantic view is to say, 'If you loved me, you wouldn't criticise me.' Actually, true love is often about trying to teach someone how to be the best version of themselves.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Love one another and help others to rise to the higher levels, simply by pouring out love. Love is infectious and the greatest healing energy.
author: Sai Baba

quote: Every one has her own love life. Every one has a dream to get a perfect life partner. But this is not so easy in real life. In fact, one doesn't love; it happens.
author: Katrina Kaif

quote: Love is friendship set on fire.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: True love is not a strong, fiery, impetuous passion. It is, on the contrary, an element calm and deep. It looks beyond mere externals, and is attracted by qualities alone. It is wise and discriminating, and its devotion is real and abiding.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: Yes, it was love at first sight. I feel that after all these years, I have finally found my soul mate.
author: Barbara Hershey

quote: Going home, spending time with the family, I feel they're my friends as well, all of them. I look forward to meeting any one of them for a coffee, and when we all get together, I just love it.
author: Domhnall Gleeson

quote: Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Love is the silent saying and saying of a single name.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: You've got to love yourself first. You've got to be okay on your own before you can be okay with somebody else.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Believe in yourself, listen to your gut, and do what you love.
author: Dylan Lauren

quote: Hunting forces a person to endure, to master themselves, even to truly get to know the wild environment. Actually, along the way, hunting and fishing makes you fall in love with the natural world. This is why hunters so often give back by contributing to conservation.
author: Donald Trump, Jr.

quote: When you love and accept yourself, when you know who really cares about you, and when you learn from your mistakes, then you stop caring about what people who don't know you think.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Grief is the price we pay for love.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: The love of a dog is a pure thing. He gives you a trust which is total. You must not betray it.
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: If I love you, I show you I love you every day. Little things, big things.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Love is a really scary thing, and you never know what's going to happen. It's one of the most beautiful things in life, but it's one of the most terrifying. It's worth the fear because you have more knowledge, experience, you learn from people, and you have memories.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Love yourself, whatever makes you different, and use it to make you stand out. Mine is my voice and the fact that I'm gay: well, the fact that I'm flamboyantly gay.
author: Ross Mathews

quote: True, we love life, not because we are used to living, but because we are used to loving. There is always some madness in love, but there is also always some reason in madness.
author: Petrarch

quote: Life is difficult for everyone; everyone has bad days. Everyone has trouble in their life, because it doesn't matter how rich you are: Sickness and trouble and worry and love, these things will mess with you at every level of life.
author: Domhnall Gleeson

quote: Family is a unique gift that needs to be appreciated and treasured, even when they're driving you crazy. As much as they make you mad, interrupt you, annoy you, curse at you, try to control you, these are the people who know you the best and who love you.
author: Jenna Morasca

quote: I do not think there is any thrill that can go through the human heart like that felt by the inventor as he sees some creation of the brain unfolding to success... such emotions make a man forget food, sleep, friends, love, everything.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: Our love, our gratitude, our admiration for our men and women in uniform, our veterans and their families - all of that is bigger than any one party or any one election.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: I love my wife and I know she loves me. We're best friends. We're just lucky to have found each other. It takes a lot of work but I just feel very blessed that I found the right person. It's a very fortunate situation and not everyone has that.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: I love looking in the mirror and feeling good about what I see.
author: Heather Morris

quote: Gay marriage - it's not about two people being gay: it's about two people who love each other and who have decided to commit to each other for the exact same reasons any other couple would get married.
author: Luke Macfarlane

quote: To love is to act.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Love will find its way through all languages on its own.
author: Rumi

quote: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Even in the deepest love relationship - when lovers say 'I love you' to each other - we don't really know what we're saying, because language isn't equal to the complexity of human emotions.
author: Duane Michals

quote: The best thing about being a DJ is making people happy. There is nothing like seeing people get up from a table to dance or the expression on their face when they hear a song they love. I also love to educate people on music they have never heard.
author: Chelsea Leyland

quote: Patriotism is love of country. But you can't love your country without loving your countrymen and countrywomen. We don't always have to agree, but we must empower each other, we must find the common ground, we must build bridges across our differences to pursue the common good.
author: Cory Booker

quote: My goal is to be able to provide for myself and not have to worry about the daily expenses. I do want to be able to benefit from my work and make a good living, but I love it so much that I would do it for free.
author: Jenn Proske

quote: People happy in love have an air of intensity.
author: Stendhal

quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
author: Helen Keller

quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Football is unconditional love.
author: Tom Brady

quote: I love being on the road. I love that lifestyle, traveling city to city, rocking out and moving on to the next place.
author: Caleb Johnson

quote: Patriotism is not an abstract concept. It begins from one's own home. It buds out from the love for one's parents, spouses and children, the love for one's own home, village and workplace, and further develops into the love for one's country and fellow people.
author: Kim Jong-un

quote: Now, what really makes a teacher is love for the human child; for it is love that transforms the social duty of the educator into the higher consciousness of a mission.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
author: Hippocrates

quote: I'm in love with red. I think it's such a passionate color. Every flag of every country pretty much has red it it. It's power, there's no fence sitting with red. Either you love it or you don't. I think its blood and strength and life. I do love red. I love all colors. Great shades of blue, you find them in nature. They're all magic.
author: Bryan Batt

quote: I have eclectic taste, and I love vintage style mixed with glamour and old world charm.
author: Sonam Kapoor

quote: Prayer is an act of love; words are not needed. Even if sickness distracts from thoughts, all that is needed is the will to love.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, so that you may be sons of your Father who is in heaven; for he makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good, and sends rain on the just and on the unjust.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Femininity is not just lipstick, stylish hairdos, and trendy clothes. It is the divine adornment of humanity. It finds expression in your qualities of your capacity to love, your spirituality, delicacy, radiance, sensitivity, creativity, charm, graciousness, gentleness, dignity, and quiet strength.
author: James E. Faust

quote: With love and patience, nothing is impossible.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: It sounds like a cliche but I also learnt that you're not going to fall for the right person until you really love yourself and feel good about how you are.
author: Emma Watson

quote: I love Paris for the million reasons that everybody loves the city. It's an incredibly romantic and beautiful place.
author: Alan Furst

quote: But I love Halloween, and I love that feeling: the cold air, the spooky dangers lurking around the corner.
author: Evan Peters

quote: Whatever possession we gain by our sword cannot be sure or lasting, but the love gained by kindness and moderation is certain and durable.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: True love doesn't come to you it has to be inside you.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: What I've enjoyed most, though, is meeting people who have a real interest in food and sharing ideas with them. Good food is a global thing and I find that there is always something new and amazing to learn - I love it!
author: Jamie Oliver

quote: I think it's not really difficult to write about love. We've been saying the same thing over and over for so many years. But it depends on how honest it is and how good you make it feel. You can say 'I love you' in a trillion ways, and it can always sound different or feel different.
author: Babyface

quote: People confuse ego, lust, insecurity with true love.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: I don't love studying. I hate studying. I like learning. Learning is beautiful.
author: Natalie Portman

quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I love women, but I feel like you can't trust some of them. Some of them are liars, you know? Like I was in the park and I met this girl, she was cute and she had a dog. And I went up to her, we started talking. She told me her dog's name. Then I said, 'Does he bite?' She said, 'No.' And I said, 'Oh yeah? Then how does he eat?' Liar.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: The two most misused words in the entire English vocabulary are love and friendship. A true friend would die for you, so when you start trying to count them on one hand, you don't need any fingers.
author: Larry Flynt

quote: In our life there is a single color, as on an artist's palette, which provides the meaning of life and art. It is the color of love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: What can a pencil do for all of us? Amazing things. It can write transcendent poetry, uplifting music, or life-changing equations; it can sketch the future, give life to untold beauty, and communicate the full-force of our love and aspirations.
author: Adam Braun

quote: You're imperfect, and you're wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Flatter me, and I may not believe you. Criticize me, and I may not like you. Ignore me, and I may not forgive you. Encourage me, and I will not forget you. Love me and I may be forced to love you.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Let's practice motivation and love, not discrimination and hate.
author: Zendaya

quote: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
author: Julius Caesar

quote: The Bible tells us to love our neighbors as ourselves. Surely part of loving in this way is trying to understand what another person wants us to understand. I may not understand perfectly and I may not agree, but if I love you I should try to know what it is you wish I could know.
author: Kevin DeYoung

quote: No human creature can give orders to love.
author: George Sand

quote: A pair of powerful spectacles has sometimes sufficed to cure a person in love.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I'm a basketball player. That's what I do and what I love but that's just not all who I am. I'm talented in a lot of different areas.
author: Kevin Durant

quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: I love to be outdoors, so I like to hike, bike and go to the beach.
author: Jillian Rose Reed

quote: I love fairy tales because of their haunting beauty and magical strangeness. They are set in worlds where anything can happen. Frogs can be kings, a thicket of brambles can hide a castle where a royal court has lain asleep for a hundred years, a boy can outwit a giant, and a girl can break a curse with nothing but her courage and steadfastness.
author: Kate Forsyth

quote: You are loved just for being who you are, just for existing. You don't have to do anything to earn it. Your shortcomings, your lack of self-esteem, physical perfection, or social and economic success - none of that matters. No one can take this love away from you, and it will always be here.
author: Ram Dass

quote: If fear is the great enemy of intimacy, love is its true friend.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: Your competition is not other people but the time you kill, the ill will you create, the knowledge you neglect to learn, the connections you fail to build, the health you sacrifice along the path, your inability to generate ideas, the people around you who don't support and love your efforts, and whatever god you curse for your bad luck.
author: James Altucher

quote: Follow your heart. Do what you love. Because I was constantly struggling with that. If it's in your heart, go for it. Don't listen to other people.
author: Maz Jobrani

quote: Food, to me, is always about cooking and eating with those you love and care for.
author: David Chang

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

quote: I've really come to realize you have to love yourself before you can expect someone else to.
author: Leah Remini

quote: Choose to be kind. Choose to forgive. Let your love grow and shine so that people may look at the example of your life and glorify God in Heaven.
author: Victoria Osteen

quote: I love natural beauty, and I think it's your best look, but I think makeup as an artist is so transformative.
author: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: Our first and last love is self-love.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: The Universal Zulu Nation stands to acknowledge wisdom, understanding, freedom, justice, and equality, peace, unity, love, and having fun, work, overcoming the negative through the positive, science, mathematics, faith, facts, and the wonders of God, whether we call him Allah, Jehovah, Yahweh, or Jah.
author: Afrika Bambaataa

quote: True generosity is an offering given freely and out of pure love. No strings attached. No expectations. Time and love are the most valuable possession you can share.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Accept yourself, love yourself.
author: Chanel Iman

quote: I want to tell women that you need to love yourself and make yourself a priority. It's only when you are happy yourself, can you make everyone else around you happy. I am still a dreamer and still believe in fairy tales, but there is only that much one should give another person. You need to keep something for yourself.
author: Bipasha Basu

quote: Love is an endless mystery, for it has nothing else to explain it.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I love the beach. I love the sea. All my life I live within - in front of the sea.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: Your duty is to treat everybody with love as a manifestation of the Lord.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Love in the real world means saying you're sorry 10 times a day.
author: Kathie Lee Gifford

quote: All things on earth point home in old October; sailors to sea, travellers to walls and fences, hunters to field and hollow and the long voice of the hounds, the lover to the love he has forsaken.
author: Thomas Wolfe

quote: I love being my husband's wife.
author: Julianna Margulies

quote: Love is not to be purchased, and affection has no price.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Drawing is the only thing I've found in which I can lose myself completely. I love it. It started as something that relaxed me, but now it's a struggle because I'm pushing myself. The day-to-day sketching is fraught.
author: Peter Capaldi

quote: Don't threaten me with love, baby. Let's just go walking in the rain.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: I don't think of myself as a role model. I do try to live in a compassionate, considerate and positive way. The only advice I can offer is to find what you love to do, find the joy in it, and express yourself through your passion.
author: Barry Williams

quote: Through Love all that is bitter will be sweet, Through Love all that is copper will be gold, Through Love all dregs will become wine, through Love all pain will turn to medicine.
author: Rumi

quote: The purest and most thoughtful minds are those which love colour the most.
author: John Ruskin

quote: I'm very happy being me, although sometimes I'd love to be a bird so that I could fly.
author: Joy Fielding

quote: All major religious traditions carry basically the same message, that is love, compassion and forgiveness the important thing is they should be part of our daily lives.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I.'
author: Ayn Rand

quote: I think it's part of my personality - I love to travel I love different cultures and philosophies and perspectives on things.
author: Martin Henderson

quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own... Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don't find very often, then that is what love is all about.
author: Bruce Forsyth

quote: Food brings people together on many different levels. It's nourishment of the soul and body it's truly love.
author: Giada De Laurentiis

quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: If you don't love me, it does not matter, anyway I can love for both of us.
author: Stendhal

quote: I hate losing and cricket being my first love, once I enter the ground it's a different zone altogether and that hunger for winning is always there.
author: Sachin Tendulkar

quote: Fall in love with a dog, and in many ways you enter a new orbit, a universe that features not just new colors but new rituals, new rules, a new way of experiencing attachment.
author: Caroline Knapp

quote: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
author: John Galsworthy
